name: CONJOIN
description:
This is CONJOIN! The aim of the game is to collect the pieces of your master weapon that have been scattered around in 3 alien filled levels, each part of the weapon you retrieve is a different weapon style. 

This was my first ever game made for a game jam (wonderjam4) and it was super fun! will 100% do again!!

Warning this game is quite hard but i tried my hardest to make it balanced as i colud.

(if it is still too difficult i will make an update asap nerfing it again)
